item.title: Jesse Tyler Ferguson on Pressure He Felt With Gay Role on ‘Modern Family’: “No Way to Please” Everyone
item.description: “I felt a responsibility from the [LGBTQ] community when I was given a role like the one I had on ‘Modern Family’ to get it right and to do it with care and precision," he says of playing Mitchell Pri
